name: icalendar-sync
description: Professional iCloud Calendar integration for OpenClaw via CalDAV
author: Black_Temple

required.name: ICLOUD_APP_PASSWORD
required.description: App-Specific Password from appleid.apple.com (NOT regular password)

optional.name: DEFAULT_CALENDAR
optional.description: Default calendar name if not specified

credentials.storage: OS keyring (macOS Keychain, Windows Credential Manager, Linux Secret Service)

capabilities: Get calendar events (with date range filtering)
Create calendar events (with alarms and recurrence)

security.credential_storage: OS keyring (macOS Keychain, Windows Credential Manager, Linux Secret Service)

warnings: CRITICAL: Use App-Specific Password from appleid.apple.com, NOT regular Apple ID password
SECURITY: Store credentials in OS keyring for maximum security
DOCKER: Use Docker secrets or external secrets manager
